attributes.action: Abolish Borough Councils where there is already a County Council in place to reduce our Council Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are we paying for Borough Councils when most of the time they are impossible to get through to, refer us to County Council and cost us far higher Council Tax payments.

There is no reason to have a two tier system when most of our services are managed at County Level and where local service are poor and costing us money unecessarily.
